welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Arao, Japan! This charming city is known for its breathtaking natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and experience all that Arao has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kumamoto Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Kumamoto Airport handles all international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nagasaki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nagasaki Airport handles all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
